## LoginActionPayload interface

Represents the action payload used to login a user

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LoginActionPayload 
```

|  [returnUrl?](./state-auth.loginactionpayload.returnurl.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A router url used to redirect the user after login |
